entries.title: Elon Musk's Tesla lost $140m on Bitcoin in 2022
entries.description: Tesla invested $1.5bn in the cryptocurrency in early 2021, and briefly accepted it as payment.

entries.title: Tech layoffs: PayPal cuts 2,000 jobs as global economy weakens
entries.description: The online payments platform is the latest technology firm to cut costs as the global economy weakens.
